main event: Eight bright, rectangular-shaped objects were observed hovering in the sky near North Dayton, Ohio on July 16, 1961.
interesting points: The objects remained stationary for 1-1/2 hours, contrasting typical behavior of astronomical phenomena,The objects were bright white in color, estimated to be at an altitude of 6-8,000 ft,They made no noise and left no trails,The sighting involved multiple witnesses, and the report raised the possibility of remote control for the objects.
sighted object: eight bright rectangular objects in the sky
witness description: individual reported as Chief Field Investigator NICAP, former Navy Officer
